review: Played for 11 minutes. talked to random people. skipped all dialogue. didnt know the story. relised that this is pretty much a talking simulator rip off of pokemon and final fantasy. fought a rat. instant death from one critical hit. quit game. uninstalled. 10/10 would talk again.

Real dread is felt when you hear 'How now you're a rockstar' and you see shrek tank barreling towards you with little common tellietubbie infected behind him while your only holding an AWP and a baseball bat at 10 hp10/10 would get shrekt again
